content:
Alexa, Anna
Perhaps a stream for funding matters would be of interest?
For those in Germany, I assume you have noted the DFG Strategic Funding Initiative:
https://www.dfg.de/en/service/press/press_releases/2019/press_release_no_50/index.html
Dear Gregg, there is a stream for funding opportunities here https://claire.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/203256-funding-opportunities
